name: Classical Music Player App UI Kit
description:
Pretty much all music player apps are designed with popular music in mind. That means that they can only display tags such as Album, Artist & Song Title.

Classical (unpopular) music on the other hand needs a lot more tags to show all the necessary information (metadata): Composer, Work, Movement, Performer, Conductor, etc.

Some apps & websites started showing more information recently, but the majority still don't.


I believe that the lack of a good example on how to approach this from a design standpoint is the reason we don't see more apps support these tags. This is what inspired me to create this UI kit.


I hope you find this helpful. Leave a comment or contact me if you have any questions.
